articles.author: Erik Kain
articles.title: Netflix's Most Popular New Movie Is Getting Rave Reviews, But 'Hit Man' Is Pretty Bad - Forbes
articles.description: Hit Man is a massive hit with critics and audiences alike and it doesn't make any sense.
articles.content:
Hit Man
Credit: Netflix
I have never been more confused by the reception of a film than I am by Netflixs new comedy-drama Hit Man, a film by longtime director Richard Linklater. The movie is scorin… [+3133 chars]
